name: DK Chronicle: Encyclopedia Of History
description:
Four million years of dynasties, disasters, travesties, as well as triumphs heroism and hedonism: witness the complete history of humankind as it happened! Relive events as they occurred through the Chronicle of the World via the Interactive Newspaper. Locate key events in a geographic and chronological order at a glance. Videos and articles provide an in-depth analysis of the events and people that have influenced the course of history.

(Source of Description - Amazon; 'DK Encyclopedia of History (Chronicle)')
